ðŸ“– Summary: BentoPDF is a self-hostable, client-side JavaScript PDF toolkit designed for privacy. It allows users to manipulate, edit, merge, and process PDF files directly in the browser without requiring any server-side interaction, ensuring data security and user privacy.
